text:
Kahoot!| Frontend Developers, Backend Developers, Fullstack Developers | Oslo, NO or London, UK | ONSITE

https://kahoot.com/jobs/

Kahoot! is a free game-based learning platform for teachers of awesome, classroom superheroes and all learners. Play, learn, have fun and celebrate together!

Tech -

Frontend: JavaScript, CSS, HTML, React, SASS

Backend: Java, Couchbase, Elasticsearch, Docker

Please apply through the website.
